I think this game is fake big time!
I have read that it is some guy that has converted the Gamecube version directly to PC.
This version has been on the net for a long time but with no mouse support. Ubisoft is the developer of the real version of Resident Evil 4 to PC and has added extra material. There is no sign of Ubisoft in this release.
worst graphics i have seen in a long time...

Xiphias83 if this is fake then the frauder must have made a new sound intro with the same voice cause he says "Biohazard 4" in the voice of all the other resident evil games. No mister this aint fake u idiot
THIS IS NOT THE REAL RESIDENT EVIL 4 FOR PC. This is more like a conversion from the GC/PS2 game. So, buy it for Gamecube or wait for the real version!

Unfortunately it's not a fake... why? First of all it goes without saying that this is a very quickly made conversion. Arrow-keys on the keyboard for moving the camera - HEY COME ON! And the graphics... oh god the graphics. Well if the game would be at least somewhat playable I might let it go with a warning :/
